item.title: My first 639: Dialogue Problem
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Hey guys,
I started a 639 rsps and I have a problem with adding a new dialogue.
I’ll put the code here:

case 1499: sendDialogue(player, CALM_TALK, -1, 1500, "Who are you?"); return true; case 1500: sendDialogue(player, CALM_TALK, 1304, 1501, "Hello, would you like to go to Lletya?"); return true; case 1501: sendDialogue(player, CALM_TALK, 1304, 1502, "You can check out some shops over there."); return true; case 1502: DialogueManager.sendOptionDialogue(player, new int[]{1503, 1504}, "Yes, why not?.", "No, sorry, I prefer staying here..."); return true; case 1503: player.setAttribute("teleportDestination", Position.create(2351, 3171, 0)); break;

This is the code I wrote, everything compiles right, no errors and when I click on the NPC (1304), the dialogue doesn’t open…

Read full topic
